example.text: ? As the only Cuban-born Member of Congress, representing a district with thousands of Americans of Cuban, Nicaraguan, and Venezuelan descent, I understand first-hand how the Biden Administration’s disastrous migration policies have led to complete chaos at our border!

?We must protect America’s seaports and critical infrastructure at all costs. Proud to introduce the bipartisan The Port Crane Security & Inspection Act of 2023 with [[user]] to defend our ports from malign actors! [[url]]

?I’ll be Chairing today’s [[user]] Subcommittee on Transportation & Maritime Security hearing. Protecting America’s seaports is a top priority of mine & crucial to #Florida’s economic development.

?Proud to join my friend & colleague [[user]], in introducing this bipartisan legislation to hold the Assad regime accountable and bar the Administration from normalizing relations with this brutal State Sponsor of Terrorism! [[url]]
